title: How to handle CVE-2021-44228 in Java applications
content: Last Friday a flaw was found in Log4j2 library which affects some recent versions of this opensource library. Letâ€™s see how to perform checks and mitigation actions if your Java applications are using a flawed Log4j2 version. As discussed in this CVE there is a flaw in certain Log4j2 versions: From 2.0.0 to version 2.14.1. ...  The post appeared first on .
